title: Shounen Kenya (Kenya Boy)
synopsis: It is the year 1941. 11-year-old Murakami Wataru lives with his family, Japanese textile traders operating in British Kenya, when war breaks out between Japan and the Allies. Fleeing into the bush, young Wataru falls headlong into a series of fantastic adventures.
staff: [['Oobayashi, Nobuhiko', ['Director', ' Editing']], ['Nakatsuru, Katsuyoshi', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Hamasu, Hideki', ['In-Between Animation']], ['Ebisawa, Kazuo', ['Background Art']]]
